description: The Montage Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Montage Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Montage Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Montage Mountain
shortDescription: The Montage Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Montage Mountain.
